text: (nabiye,) nuhinum addehattinre sesamulla pravacakanmarkkum nam sandesam nalkiyat peale tanne ninakkum nam sandesam nalkiyirikkunnu. ibrahim, isma'il, isakh‌, ya'akhub‌. ya'akhub santatikal, isa, ayyub‌, yunus‌, harun, sulaiman ennivarkkum nam sandesam nalkiyirikkunnu. davudin nam sabur (sankirttanam) nalki
